creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: two panels of bright blue satin heavily embroidered with flowers, bird and a tiger on (a) and a rat on (b); bright multi colors; red tape on outer edges with gold metal; horizontal lower borders with frogs, fish and insects
medium: Silk, satin, cotton, gold color metal; needlework
title: Set of Two Embroidered Panels
